text: The area of Esashi District in Sōya Subprefecture. is a district located in Sōya Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2004, the district has an estimated population of 16,986 and a density of 8.87 persons per km². The total area is . ==Towns and villages== *Esashi *Hamatonbetsu *Nakatonbetsu ==Merger== *On March 20, 2006 the town of Utanobori merged into the town of Esashi. Category:Districts in Hokkaido
title: Esashi District, Hokkaido
